title: Ella Lloyd on her breakout year - why F1 Academy star keeps getting better
summary: She's backed by McLaren and is an F1 Academy race-winner in her debut season. Ella Lloyd tellsJames Elsonher racing career is going "pretty well"

qa_pairs.question: Which team is backing Ella Lloyd in her racing career?
What achievement has Ella Lloyd accomplished in her debut season in the F1 Academy?
wrong_options: She finished in the top three in every race.
She received the rookie of the year award.

qa_pairs.question: What is the F1 Academy?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A racing series designed to promote female drivers.
wrong_options: A driver training program for F1 teams.
A technical development initiative for F1 cars.
